title: Function invocation
description: A function evaluation is used to describe which XDM objects or values need to be passed to a function

xdm:function.title: Function identifier
xdm:function.description: Unique identifier for the function. The identifier is resolvable against a function repository. The resolved meta data resource can be used to invoke the function.
